name: CreateWebsetSearch
description:
Create a new search for a specified webset.

Use this tool to create a new search within a webset, reusing previous search results and applying new criteria.

parameters.name: webset_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the Webset you want to create a search in.

parameters.name: search_criteria
parameters.description: JSON object representing new search criteria for the webset. This specifies the parameters or conditions for the new search.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the exa API.
